title: Nordest’s Bardino 3 Pre-Order Comes with a Fox 36 Grip2 Kit
content: The Nordest Bardino is the brand’s flagship rowdy hardtail and open today is the brand’s pre-order for the latest model to roll out its doors, the Bardino 3. With that pre-order comes some wild savings. Everything you see here, the frame, Fox Float 36 Grip2 fork, and the Cane Creek headset is only 1.749,00 € at this introductory offer. Head on over to Nordest to read all the details.
author: prolly
